dict.acceptation: 股；（参与、得到等的）份；（分享到的或贡献出的）一份；市场占有率；

sent.orig: Share buy-back write-off, it will lead to reduction of share capital, earnings share will increase.
sent.trans: 回购股份注销，就会导致股本减少，每股收益会提高。

sent.orig: Meanwhile resources and the risk of joining those who share share.
sent.trans: 同时资源和风险是加盟者共享、分担的。

sent.orig: Here are some sweets for you, children; make sure you share and share alike.
sent.trans: 孩子们，给你们些糖果，你们一定要平均分配。

sent.orig: Not only do we share household worries and parental burdens, we also share ideas.
sent.trans: 我们不仅分担家庭烦恼和赡养义务，而且互相交流观点。

sent.orig: Also known as registered share capital or nominal share capitalnumber of shares issued.
sent.trans: 也称为法定股本，即公司可合法发行的股本总额。
